flawed_nl_solution:
If in five years, Hania will be 45 years old, currently she is 45-5 = <<45-5=40>>40 years old.
Ten years ago, Hania was 40-10 = <<40-10=20>>20 years old.
Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 years old.
In five years, Samir will be 10+5 = <<10+5=15>>15 years old
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
